me hethuwen 26 wanida shri lanka netbol kridikawo skotland bala pitathwime apekshawen pasuwethi.shri lankawa ha skotlanthaya athara palamu tharagaya me 28 wanida pawathwimata niyamithawa athi heyin awasan mohothe shri lanka kridikawanta yamata siduwa atha.derata athara test netbol tharaga 3 k pawathwena athara dewani tharagaya mayi 31 ha thewani tharagaya juni 2 da pawathwe.labana juli masaye singappuruwe pawathwena loka suratha netbol tharagawaliyata perahuruwak lesa skotlantha tharaga sancharaya yoda gane.loka netbol kandayam wargikaranayedi shri lankawa 15 wani sthanaye sitina athara skotlanthaya 16 wani sthanaye pasuwethi.
